top_categories.workout_context: KowTown Gravel's Colorado Rockies, Mountain gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 60 miles.
75ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Race-pace efforts that mimic KowTown Gravel's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before June.
At KowTown Gravel, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
When someone attacks on Colorado Rockies gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of KowTown Gravel. Train it until it feels boring.
Varied gradients on Colorado Rockies gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At KowTown Gravel, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
60 miles on Colorado Rockies gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Base fitness for KowTown Gravel. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Smooth pedaling at 60 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for KowTown Gravel’s 60 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at KowTown Gravel. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at KowTown Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on colorado rockies gravel to build confidence. Expect: colorado rockies, mountain gravel, high altitude.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 60 miles of colorado rockies gravel in Kremmling, CO.
